name: NANO ECO-HOSTEL
address: Thôn Cư Chánh 1, Xã Thủy Bằng, thị xã Hương Thủy, Huế, Việt Nam
description:
NANO ECO-HOSTEL có hồ bơi ngoài trời, khu vườn, phòng chờ chung và sân hiên ở Huế. Ngoài nhà hàng, chỗ nghỉ còn có quầy bar. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, dịch vụ tiền sảnh và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Khách có thể chơi trò phi tiêu tại khách sạn. Ngoài ra, đi xe đạp là hoạt động được ưa chuộng trong khu vực.

NANO ECO-HOSTEL cách Lăng Tự Đức 5.4 km và Cầu Tràng Tiền 7.2 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay quốc tế Phú Bài, cách chỗ nghỉ 16 km.

review.rating: Cảnh đẹp, gần với thiên nhiên, gần một số địa điểm tham quan, nhà hàng
review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Cảnh Núi Non
review.comment_positive: Cảnh đẹp, gần một số địa điểm tham quan.

review.room_type: Giường trong Phòng ngủ tập thể 4 người
review.comment_positive: Phòng rất xinh. Khu vực sinh hoạt chung rất xinh. Nhân viên cưcj kỳ tốt. Cảm giác như 1 resort cao cấp vây. Nơi retreat rất ổn
review.comment_negative: Vị trí hơi xa trung tâm. Nếu vị trí ở cách 3km thì rất tuyệt

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: không gian rộng rãi,view xịn xò thật sự.Chill lắm ạ,chị lễ tân rất chi là nhiệt tình

review.room_type: Giường trong Phòng ngủ tập thể 4 người
review.comment_positive:
Giá cả khá cao đối với người dân bản địa nên tôi ăn uống trong thành phố Huế.
Tôi thich không gian xung quanh và mức độ sạch sẽ ở đây.
review.comment_negative:
Không có chỗ phơi đồ cho người không có nhu cầu sử dụng dịch vụ launchdry
Bể bơi và võng treo hơi nhỏ so với tưởng tượng, bể sâu tầm

review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Cảnh Núi Non
review.comment_positive: The best hotel we stayed in during our trip. Everything was absolutely perfect, the room was stunning and very quiet, the pool beautiful, the food absolutely delicious ... don't hesitate !
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.room_type: Giường trong Phòng ngủ tập thể 4 người
review.comment_positive: The most amazing hostel I’ve stayed in Vietnam on my 2 months journey so far☀️❤️ The food is amazing, the staff so friendly and helpful, loved the design and how relaxing the place is. Very good experience and looking forward to go back one day!!

review.rating: Probably the best hostel I ever stayed in.
review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
review.comment_positive: This was such a beautiful, peaceful place. The pool and eating area is so beautiful. I wish I had stayed longer. I spent a whole day reading and relaxing by the pool, it is such a green and relaxing oasis. The bed in the dorm was really big and comfortable and the bathrooms very nice and clean. In general the whole house has a beautiful modern, but chill architecture. 10/10 recommend staying here and I would do minimum 2 - 3 nights.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: This was our favorite stay during our trip! Na and her staff were simply amazing! The surrounding area is gorgeous, and
review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Cảnh Núi Non
review.comment_positive: After staying in the city, we were so relieved to find this peaceful place in the country. We stayed in the private room, and it was gorgeous! Even tho we had our private room, we enjoyed talking with younger people who were staying in the hostel. The small food menu was great, and we enjoyed many different cocktails! Na and her staff were wonderful ! Na went above and beyond to make sure our trip went smoothly…we cannot thank her enough for her patience and understanding! Another plus…our bed was so comfortable, and the bedding was amazing! The outdoor shower was wonderful…I loved taking a shower under the moonlight🙂
review.comment_negative: We loved everything!

review.room_type: Giường trong Phòng ngủ tập thể 4 người
review.comment_positive: Super pretty and comfy common area. Big bedrooms with big bathroom. Amazingly comfy bed and blanket and pillow. Everything clean. Refreshing pool.
review.comment_negative: Unfriendly staff in the morning (seemed their mobile phones were more important than the customers). The breakfast was  the saddest I have had in Vietnam. For 80k I got a badly cooked, very moist omelette with 2 small slices of dry Baguette and a small glass of juice  Location far from centre, means you need to spend extra on transport into town (use Grab, much cheaper than what the hotel offers).

review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
review.comment_positive: It is so beautiful and clean, basically just like the pictures. The rooftop garden area is so nice and the beds are bigger than any other hostel I’ve stayed in. It is quite quiet as well.
review.comment_negative: It is outside the city so you must have a motorbike or be willing to spend on Grab.

review.comment_positive: The most amazing hostel I’ve stayed in Vietnam on my 2 months journey so far☀️❤️ The food is amazing, the staff so friendly and helpful, loved the design and how relaxing the place is. Very good experience and looking forward to go back one day!!

review.rating: Probably the best hostel I ever stayed in.
review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
review.comment_positive: This was such a beautiful, peaceful place. The pool and eating area is so beautiful. I wish I had stayed longer. I spent a whole day reading and relaxing by the pool, it is such a green and relaxing oasis. The bed in the dorm was really big and comfortable and the bathrooms very nice and clean. In general the whole house has a beautiful modern, but chill architecture. 10/10 recommend staying here and I would do minimum 2 - 3 nights.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.rating: This was our favorite stay during our trip! Na and her staff were simply amazing! The surrounding area is gorgeous, and
review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Cảnh Núi Non
review.comment_positive: After staying in the city, we were so relieved to find this peaceful place in the country. We stayed in the private room, and it was gorgeous! Even tho we had our private room, we enjoyed talking with younger people who were staying in the hostel. The small food menu was great, and we enjoyed many different cocktails! Na and her staff were wonderful ! Na went above and beyond to make sure our trip went smoothly…we cannot thank her enough for her patience and understanding! Another plus…our bed was so comfortable, and the bedding was amazing! The outdoor shower was wonderful…I loved taking a shower under the moonlight🙂
review.comment_negative: We loved everything!

review.room_type: Giường trong Phòng ngủ tập thể 4 người
review.comment_positive: Super pretty and comfy common area. Big bedrooms with big bathroom. Amazingly comfy bed and blanket and pillow. Everything clean. Refreshing pool.
review.comment_negative: Unfriendly staff in the morning (seemed their mobile phones were more important than the customers). The breakfast was  the saddest I have had in Vietnam. For 80k I got a badly cooked, very moist omelette with 2 small slices of dry Baguette and a small glass of juice  Location far from centre, means you need to spend extra on transport into town (use Grab, much cheaper than what the hotel offers).

review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
review.comment_positive: It is so beautiful and clean, basically just like the pictures. The rooftop garden area is so nice and the beds are bigger than any other hostel I’ve stayed in. It is quite quiet as well.
review.comment_negative: It is outside the city so you must have a motorbike or be willing to spend on Grab.

review.comment_positive: After staying in the city, we were so relieved to find this peaceful place in the country. We stayed in the private room, and it was gorgeous! Even tho we had our private room, we enjoyed talking with younger people who were staying in the hostel. The small food menu was great, and we enjoyed many different cocktails! Na and her staff were wonderful ! Na went above and beyond to make sure our trip went smoothly…we cannot thank her enough for her patience and understanding! Another plus…our bed was so comfortable, and the bedding was amazing! The outdoor shower was wonderful…I loved taking a shower under the moonlight🙂
review.comment_negative: We loved everything!

review.room_type: Giường trong Phòng ngủ tập thể 4 người
review.comment_positive: Super pretty and comfy common area. Big bedrooms with big bathroom. Amazingly comfy bed and blanket and pillow. Everything clean. Refreshing pool.
review.comment_negative: Unfriendly staff in the morning (seemed their mobile phones were more important than the customers). The breakfast was  the saddest I have had in Vietnam. For 80k I got a badly cooked, very moist omelette with 2 small slices of dry Baguette and a small glass of juice  Location far from centre, means you need to spend extra on transport into town (use Grab, much cheaper than what the hotel offers).

review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
review.comment_positive: It is so beautiful and clean, basically just like the pictures. The rooftop garden area is so nice and the beds are bigger than any other hostel I’ve stayed in. It is quite quiet as well.
review.comment_negative: It is outside the city so you must have a motorbike or be willing to spend on Grab.

review.rating: Cảnh đẹp, gần với thiên nhiên, gần một số địa điểm tham quan, nhà hàng
review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Cảnh Núi Non
review.comment_positive: Cảnh đẹp, gần một số địa điểm tham quan.

review.room_type: Giường trong Phòng ngủ tập thể 4 người
review.comment_positive: Phòng rất xinh. Khu vực sinh hoạt chung rất xinh. Nhân viên cưcj kỳ tốt. Cảm giác như 1 resort cao cấp vây. Nơi retreat rất ổn
review.comment_negative: Vị trí hơi xa trung tâm. Nếu vị trí ở cách 3km thì rất tuyệt

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: không gian rộng rãi,view xịn xò thật sự.Chill lắm ạ,chị lễ tân rất chi là nhiệt tình

review.room_type: Giường trong Phòng ngủ tập thể 4 người
review.comment_positive:
Giá cả khá cao đối với người dân bản địa nên tôi ăn uống trong thành phố Huế.
Tôi thich không gian xung quanh và mức độ sạch sẽ ở đây.
review.comment_negative:
Không có chỗ phơi đồ cho người không có nhu cầu sử dụng dịch vụ launchdry
Bể bơi và võng treo hơi nhỏ so với tưởng tượng, bể sâu tầm

review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Cảnh Núi Non
review.comment_positive: The best hotel we stayed in during our trip. Everything was absolutely perfect, the room was stunning and very quiet, the pool beautiful, the food absolutely delicious ... don't hesitate !
review.comment_negative: nothing

review.room_type: Giường trong Phòng ngủ tập thể 4 người
review.comment_positive: The most amazing hostel I’ve stayed in Vietnam on my 2 months journey so far☀️❤️ The food is amazing, the staff so friendly and helpful, loved the design and how relaxing the place is. Very good experience and looking forward to go back one day!!

review.rating: Probably the best hostel I ever stayed in.
review.room_type: Giường Trong Phòng Ngủ Tập Thể Cho Cả Nam Và Nữ 6 Giường
review.comment_positive: This was such a beautiful, peaceful place. The pool and eating area is so beautiful. I wish I had stayed longer. I spent a whole day reading and relaxing by the pool, it is such a green and relaxing oasis. The bed in the dorm was really big and comfortable and the bathrooms very nice and clean. In general the whole house has a beautiful modern, but chill architecture. 10/10 recommend staying here and I would do minimum 2 - 3 nights.
review.comment_negative: Nothing
